org.apache.solr.cloud

Class OverseerAutoReplicaFailoverThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.cloud.OverseerAutoReplicaFailoverThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Runnable

    public class OverseerAutoReplicaFailoverThread
extends Object
implements Runnable, Closeable
    In this simple initial implementation we are limited in how quickly we detect a failure by a worst case of roughly zk session timeout + WAIT_AFTER_EXPIRATION_SECONDS + WORK_LOOP_DELAY_MS and best case of roughly zk session timeout + WAIT_AFTER_EXPIRATION_SECONDS. Also, consider the time to create the SolrCore, do any recovery necessary, and warm up the readers. NOTE: this will only work with collections created via the collections api because they will have defined replicationFactor and maxShardsPerNode.
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.
